price: 24. Mpe soki batuni bango, nini Nkolo wa bino akitisa? Bakolobaka: Ezali masapo makala.
arabic: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُم مَّاذَآ أَنزَلَ رَبُّكُمۡ قَالُوٓاْ أَسَٰطِيرُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā qīla lahum mādhā anzala rabbukum qālū asāṭīru al-awalīna
